resources.name: replicate-models
resources.title: Public models list
resources.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all public models on Replicate.

resources.name: replicate-predictions
resources.title: Predictions list
resources.description: List all predictions created by the authenticated user or organization.

resources.name: replicate-deployments
resources.title: Deployments list
resources.description: Retrieve all deployments belonging to the authenticated account.

resources.name: replicate-trainings
resources.title: Trainings list
resources.description: List all model training runs associated with the authenticated account.

resources.name: replicate-files
resources.title: Files list
resources.description: Retrieve metadata for all uploaded files associated with the authenticated account.

resources.name: replicate-hardware
resources.title: Available hardware list
resources.description: List all available compute hardware SKUs such as CPU, GPU-T4, and GPU-A40.

resources.name: replicate-collections
resources.title: Collections list
resources.description: List all public model collections like super-resolution or image-restoration.

resources.name: replicate-account
resources.title: Authenticated account info
resources.description: Get information about the user or organization linked to the provided API token.

resources.name: replicate-webhook-secret
resources.title: Default webhook secret
resources.description: Retrieve the signing secret used to verify Replicate webhook requests.
